title: I Can Still Carry More!
detail_text: <:th_ch0003/>S-sorry, Kanan-chan~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Huh, what for?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>For making you carry my stuff... I thought I could carry it all by myself when I saw all this at the fabric store~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Hahaha, you don’t have to apologize~ Don’t worry about it at all.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>But~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>I’m totally fine with this much!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Really? Then let me thank you in return. The cafe up ahead is where I work part-time. The cakes are delicious, so I’ll treat you!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Eh!? No, that’s too much for just carrying some bags...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>But you helped me a lot... Please!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>...Alright, I’ll let you treat me then. But I feel like I haven’t done enough to deserve it, so let’s check out some more fabric stores. I can still carry more~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
